page.title: 12Occupations
page.content: There is a large proportion of retired people in the area and a large proportion of wives do not go out to work. There isnt much work in the vilalge other than farming. There is one worker who helps with the Post Office. Few people have casual work at local Public House. One villager has just bulit up photogrpahy business. Thre aer two self employed cabinet maker/craftsmen. Aprt from this small proportion of wrkers and teh bulk of farmers/workers the rest travel otu of the aea for a variety of occupations inluding vet, teaching, nursing, factory workers, HGV driver, clerical workers, shop workers and RAF.
